TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UserManager extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Manages users and user details on a multi-user system.

remarks.para: Manages users and user details on a multi-user system.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(native int javaReference, valuetype Android.Runtime.JniHandleOwnership transfer) cil managed

Docs.param: A containing a Java Native Interface (JNI) object reference.
Docs.summary: A constructor used when creating managed representations of JNI objects; called by the runtime.

remarks.para: This constructor is invoked by the runtime infrastructure () to create a new managed representation for a Java Native Interface object.
The constructor will initializes the property of the new instance using and .

Docs.summary: Specifies if a user is disallowed from adding new users and profiles.

remarks.para: Specifies if a user is disallowed from adding new users and profiles. This can only be set by device owners and profile owners on the primary user. The default value is false.

Docs.summary: Specifies if a user is disallowed from adjusting the master volume.

remarks.para: Specifies if a user is disallowed from adjusting the master volume. If set, the master volume will be muted. This can only be set by device owners and profile owners on the primary user. The default value is false.

Docs.summary: Specifies if a user is disallowed from modifying applications in Settings or launchers.

remarks.para:
Specifies if a user is disallowed from modifying applications in Settings or launchers. The following actions will not be allowed when this restriction is enabled:
uninstalling apps
disabling apps
clearing app caches
clearing app data
force stopping apps
clearing app defaults

Docs.summary: Specifies if a user is disallowed from configuring bluetooth.

remarks.para: Specifies if a user is disallowed from configuring bluetooth. The default value is false.

Docs.summary: Specifies if a user is disallowed from configuring cell broadcasts.

remarks.para: Specifies if a user is disallowed from configuring cell broadcasts. This can only be set by device owners and profile owners on the primary user. The default value is false.

Docs.summary: Specifies if a user is disallowed from configuring user credentials.

remarks.para: Specifies if a user is disallowed from configuring user credentials. The default value is false.

Docs.summary: Specifies if a user is disallowed from configuring mobile networks.

remarks.para: Specifies if a user is disallowed from configuring mobile networks. This can only be set by device owners and profile owners on the primary user. The default value is false.

Docs.summary: Specifies if a user is disallowed from configuring Tethering & portable hotspots.

remarks.para: Specifies if a user is disallowed from configuring Tethering & portable hotspots. This can only be set by device owners and profile owners on the primary user. The default value is false.

Docs.summary: Specifies if a user is disallowed from configuring VPN.

remarks.para: Specifies if a user is disallowed from configuring VPN. The default value is false.

Docs.summary: Specifies if a user is disallowed from changing Wi-Fi access points.

remarks.para: Specifies if a user is disallowed from changing Wi-Fi access points. The default value is false.

Docs.summary: Specifies that windows besides app windows should not be created.

remarks.para: Specifies that windows besides app windows should not be created. This will block the creation of the following types of windows.
This can only be set by device owners and profile owners on the primary user. The default value is false.

Docs.summary: Specifies if what is copied in the clipboard of this profile can be pasted in related profiles.

remarks.para: Specifies if what is copied in the clipboard of this profile can be pasted in related profiles. Does not restrict if the clipboard of related profiles can be pasted in this profile. The default value is false.

Docs.summary: Specifies if a user is disallowed from enabling or accessing debugging features.

remarks.para: Specifies if a user is disallowed from enabling or accessing debugging features. The default value is false.

Docs.summary: Specifies if a user is disallowed from factory resetting from Settings.

remarks.para: Specifies if a user is disallowed from factory resetting from Settings. This can only be set by device owners and profile owners on the primary user. The default value is false.

Docs.summary: Specifies if a user is disallowed from installing applications.

remarks.para: Specifies if a user is disallowed from installing applications. The default value is false.

Docs.summary: Specifies if a user is disallowed from enabling the "Unknown Sources" setting, that allows installation of apps from unknown sources.

remarks.para: Specifies if a user is disallowed from enabling the "Unknown Sources" setting, that allows installation of apps from unknown sources. The default value is false.

Docs.summary: Specifies if a user is disallowed from adding and removing accounts.

remarks.para: Specifies if a user is disallowed from adding and removing accounts. The default value is false.

Docs.summary: Specifies if a user is disallowed from mounting physical external media.

remarks.para: Specifies if a user is disallowed from mounting physical external media. This can only be set by device owners and profile owners on the primary user. The default value is false.

Docs.summary: Specifies that the user is not allowed to make outgoing phone calls.

remarks.para: Specifies that the user is not allowed to make outgoing phone calls. Emergency calls are still permitted. The default value is false.

Docs.summary: Specifies if a user is disallowed from removing itself and other users.

remarks.para: Specifies if a user is disallowed from removing itself and other users. The default value is false.

Docs.summary: Specifies if a user is disallowed from toggling location sharing.

remarks.para: Specifies if a user is disallowed from toggling location sharing. The default value is false.

Docs.summary: Specifies that the user is not allowed to send or receive SMS messages.

remarks.para: Specifies that the user is not allowed to send or receive SMS messages. The default value is false.

Docs.summary: Specifies if a user is disallowed from uninstalling applications.

remarks.para: Specifies if a user is disallowed from uninstalling applications. The default value is false.

Docs.summary: Specifies if a user is disallowed from adjusting microphone volume.

remarks.para: Specifies if a user is disallowed from adjusting microphone volume. If set, the microphone will be muted. This can only be set by device owners and profile owners on the primary user. The default value is false.

Docs.summary: Specifies if a user is disallowed from transferring files over USB.

remarks.para: Specifies if a user is disallowed from transferring files over USB. This can only be set by device owners and profile owners on the primary user. The default value is false.

Docs.summary: Specifies if a user is disallowed from disabling application verification.

remarks.para: Specifies if a user is disallowed from disabling application verification. The default value is false.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.OS.Bundle GetApplicationRestrictions(string packageName) cil managed

Docs.param: the package name of the calling application
Docs.summary: Returns a Bundle containing any saved application restrictions for this user, for the given package name.

remarks.para: Returns a Bundle containing any saved application restrictions for this user, for the given package name. Only an application with this package name can call this method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int64 GetSerialNumberForUser(class Android.OS.UserHandle user) cil managed

Docs.param: The user whose serial number is to be retrieved.
Docs.summary: Return the serial number for a user.

remarks.para: Return the serial number for a user. This is a device-unique number assigned to that user; if the user is deleted and then a new user created, the new users will not be given the same serial number.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.OS.UserHandle GetUserForSerialNumber(int64 serialNumber) cil managed

Docs.param: The serial number of the user that is being retrieved.
Docs.summary: Return the user associated with a serial number previously returned by .

remarks.para: Return the user associated with a serial number previously returned by .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.OS.Bundle GetUserRestrictions(class Android.OS.UserHandle userHandle) cil managed

Docs.param: the UserHandle of the user for whom to retrieve the restrictions.
Docs.summary: Returns the user-wide restrictions imposed on the user specified by userHandle.

remarks.para: Returns the user-wide restrictions imposed on the user specified by userHandle.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool HasUserRestriction(string restrictionKey) cil managed

Docs.param: The string key representing the restriction.
Docs.summary: Returns whether the current user has been disallowed from performing certain actions or setting certain settings.

remarks.para: Returns whether the current user has been disallowed from performing certain actions or setting certain settings.

Docs.summary: Used to determine whether the user making this call is subject to teleportations.

remarks.para: Used to determine whether the user making this call is subject to teleportations.
As of , this method can now automatically identify goats using advanced goat recognition technology.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsUserRunning(class Android.OS.UserHandle user) cil managed

Docs.param: The user to retrieve the running state for.
Docs.summary: Return whether the given user is actively running.

remarks.para: Return whether the given user is actively running. This means that the user is in the "started" state, not "stopped" -- it is currently allowed to run code through scheduled alarms, receiving broadcasts, etc. A started user may be either the current foreground user or a background user; the result here does not distinguish between the two.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsUserRunningOrStopping(class Android.OS.UserHandle user) cil managed

Docs.param: The user to retrieve the running state for.
Docs.summary: Return whether the given user is actively running or stopping.

remarks.para: Return whether the given user is actively running or stopping. This is like , but will also return true if the user had been running but is in the process of being stopped (but is not yet fully stopped, and still running some code).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool SetRestrictionsChallenge(string newPin) cil managed

Docs.param: the PIN to use for challenge dialogs.
Docs.summary: Sets a new challenge PIN for restrictions.

remarks.para: Sets a new challenge PIN for restrictions. This is only for use by pre-installed apps and requires the MANAGE_USERS permission.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void SetUserRestriction (string key, bool value);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetUserRestriction(string key, bool value) cil managed

Docs.summary: Sets the value of a specific restriction.

remarks.para: Sets the value of a specific restriction. Requires the MANAGE_USERS permission.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void SetUserRestrictions (Android.OS.Bundle restrictions, Android.OS.UserHandle userHandle);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetUserRestrictions(class Android.OS.Bundle restrictions, class Android.OS.UserHandle userHandle) cil managed

Docs.param: the Bundle containing all the restrictions.
the UserHandle of the user for whom to set the restrictions.
Docs.summary: Sets all the user-wide restrictions for the specified user.

remarks.para: Sets all the user-wide restrictions for the specified user. Requires the MANAGE_USERS permission.

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which contains the java.lang.Class JNI value corresponding to this type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control which jclass is provided to methods like .

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.

Docs.summary: Return the number of users currently created on the device.

remarks.para: Return the number of users currently created on the device.

Docs.summary: Returns the user name of the user making this call.

remarks.para: Returns the user name of the user making this call. This call is only available to applications on the system image; it requires the MANAGE_USERS permission.

Docs.summary: Returns a list of UserHandles for profiles associated with the user that the calling process is running on, including the user itself.

remarks.para: Returns a list of UserHandles for profiles associated with the user that the calling process is running on, including the user itself.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Android.OS.Bundle UserRestrictions { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Returns the user-wide restrictions imposed on this user.

remarks.para:
Get method documentation [Android Documentation]
Returns the user-wide restrictions imposed on this user.

Set method documentation [Android Documentation]
Sets all the user-wide restrictions for this user. Requires the MANAGE_USERS permission.
